Key.Original: Its vapor depresses the central nervous system of a patient, allowing a doctor to perform various otherwise painful procedures.
Key.English: Its vapor depresses the central nervous system of a patient, allowing a doctor to perform various otherwise painful procedures.
Key.German: Its vapor depresses the central nervous system of a patient, allowing a doctor to perform various otherwise painful procedures.
Key.Russian: Its vapor depresses the central nervous system of a patient, allowing a doctor to perform various otherwise painful procedures.

Key.Original: A trophy of your struggles and a glimpse into your brutal past. 'To the victor and champion of survival, your victims ear!'
Key.English: A trophy of your struggles and a glimpse into your brutal past. 'To the victor and champion of survival, your victims ear!'
Key.German: A trophy of your struggles and a glimpse into your brutal past. 'To the victor and champion of survival, your victims ear!'
Key.Russian: A trophy of your struggles and a glimpse into your brutal past. 'To the victor and champion of survival, your victims ear!'
